tasks.label: URSim: start (ur3e)
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && ros2 run ur_client_library start_ursim.sh -m ur3e

tasks.label: UR Driver: start (URSim ur3e)
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source ${workspaceFolder}/ros2_ws/install/setup.bash && ros2 launch ur_robot_driver ur_control.launch.py ur_type:=ur3e robot_ip:=192.168.56.101 launch_rviz:=true

tasks.label: MoveIt: start (UR ur3e)
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source ${workspaceFolder}/ros2_ws/install/setup.bash && ros2 launch ur_moveit_config ur_moveit.launch.py ur_type:=ur3e launch_rviz:=true
